Package Helper

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
Helper.Utils
public class Utils extends Object
Collection of useful methods for the C195 Software Scheduling program

  • Field Details

    • LOG_IN_WINDOW_LOCATION

      public static final String LOG_IN_WINDOW_LOCATION
      Location of fxml files for all windows used in this program. Saved here for the ability to change them all in one place.

  • Method Details

    • changeWindow

      public static void changeWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String fileName, String title) throws IOException
      Changes the window to the window matching the fileName parameter.
      Parameters:
      event - mouseclick that activated the button.
      fileName - String name of the file that the window will be changed to.
      title - String title the new window should have.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the fxml file to be changed to isn't found.

    • confirmBack

      public static boolean confirmBack()
      Creates and displays an alert whenever leaving a window that has multiple controls that may be populated with user entered data.
      Returns:
      true if customer agrees to continue, or false otherwise.

    • displayAlert

      public static void displayAlert(String message)
      Generic information alert created and displayed with the String message parameter as its content.
      Parameters:
      message - String message to be displayed in the information alert.

    • displayAlert

      public static void displayAlert(String message, String headerStr)
      Overloaded generic alert displaying method, adds the ability to change the alert header.
      Parameters:
      message - String message to be displayed in the information alert.
      headerStr - String to change the alert's header to.

    • updatePassFail

      public static boolean updatePassFail(int rowsAffected)
      Method to inform the user if a query was successful or not, based on the number of rows affected in a PreparedStatement execution.
      Parameters:
      rowsAffected - int number of rows affected in a PreparedStatement.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false otherwise.

    • verifyBusinessHours

      public static boolean verifyBusinessHours(ZonedDateTime start, ZonedDateTime end)
      Checks that a new appointment's hours coincides with the companies business hours in Eastern Time.
      Parameters:
      start - ZonedDateTime of new appointment's start time.
      end - ZonedDateTime of new appointment's end time.
      Returns:
      true if the new hours fall within business hours, false otherwise.

    • checkCustomerOverlap

      public static boolean checkCustomerOverlap(ZonedDateTime startOne, ZonedDateTime endOne, int customerID)
      Queries the database and creates a list of all appointments a customer is scheduled to attend, then checks to make sure that a new appointment does not overlap any of the already scheduled ones.
      Parameters:
      startOne - ZonedDateTime of new appointments start time.
      endOne - ZonedDateTime of new appointments end time.
      customerID - int customerID to filter appointments by.
      Returns:
      true if the hours don't overlap. False otherwise.

    • checkCustomerOverlap

      public static boolean checkCustomerOverlap(ZonedDateTime startOne, ZonedDateTime endOne, int customerID, int appointmentID)
      Overloaded method. Adds an appointment ID so that when modifying appointments, it doesn't look at the existing appointment as an overlap. Queries the database and creates a list of all appointments a customer is scheduled to attend, then checks to make sure that a new appointment does not overlap any of the already scheduled ones.
      Parameters:
      startOne - ZonedDateTime of new appointments start time.
      endOne - ZonedDateTime of new appointments end time.
      customerID - int customerID to filter appointments by.
      appointmentID - int appointmentID to filter out looking at this appointment when checking hours.
      Returns:
      true if the hours don't overlap. False otherwise.
